meanings.definition: The origin or mode of formation of something.
meanings.sent1: The geneses of the new company can be traced back to a small garage.
meanings.sent2: The geneses of the friendship between the two children began in kindergarten.
meanings.sent3: The geneses of the plan to have a surprise party were full of excitement.
meanings.sent4: The geneses of the idea to start a community garden blossomed like a seed in fertile soil.
meanings.sent5: The geneses of the tradition to have a family picnic every summer started with a simple picnic blanket.

meanings.definition: The first book of the Bible, which describes the creation of the world.
meanings.sent1: In Sunday school, the teacher read from the Geneses to explain the story of creation.
meanings.sent2: Many people find comfort in the stories of the Geneses in times of need.
meanings.sent3: The Geneses is often the first book children learn about in religious education.
meanings.sent4: The words in the Geneses paint a vivid picture of how the world came to be.
meanings.sent5: The Geneses is a timeless tale that has been passed down through generations.
